message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. This is a great deal, as you know this product is worth at least $1,000,000 to you. Let me know your thoughts!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product is significant to you, but based on my assessment, I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to settle for $950,000. Considering the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I believe we can still find common ground. I am willing to pay $1,025,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can move forward.
